      • executeFirebaseSectionUpload

        public void executeFirebaseSectionUpload(java.lang.String UID,
                                         java.lang.String ID,
                                         androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner owner)
        Upload the section info to firebase when internet connectivity is present It will be done in the background
        Parameters:
        UID - User ID used to associate the section with the user
        ID - To get the used in database as the key for firebase
        owner - to be used to observe my upload
